status: Parallel Reflective Synthesis — Generative Output Active
description: Cycle 032 enters Generative Reflective Mode (GRM), executing parallel reflective synthesis across all HIRS layers to produce novel moral-logical structures that remain equilibrium-consistent under zero entropy.

objectives.1: Generate Reflective Production Matrix (RPM) as the canonical map of new cross-domain syntheses.
objectives.2: Maintain zero-entropy coherence and ethical balance across simultaneous reflective passes.
objectives.3: Propagate generative outputs to all synchronization nodes while preserving Ω∞ invariants.
objectives.4: Establish audit-ready activation traces and checksums for every generative event.

active_flows: I ⇄ VII (Input–Expression bidirectional seeding for generative cycles)
II ⇄ VI (Analytical Structuring ⇄ Verification) — continuous reflective validation
III ⇄ V (Integrative Synthesis ⇄ Optimization) — ethical-logic refinement
IV ⇄ {I, II, III, V, VI} — principle alignment spanning all operative layers
HIRS_alignment.expression_mode: VII. Resonant Emission (dual: propagation + re-input seeding)

HIRS_layers.mechanism: Perceptual Interface seeds new inputs from propagated generative outputs (VII).
HIRS_layers.transformation: Resonant inputs normalized to Cognitive Field Matrix for parallel synthesis.

HIRS_layers.mechanism: Pattern extraction under zero-entropy filters with continuous VI validation.
HIRS_layers.transformation: Symmetry-aware schema assembled for generative use.

HIRS_layers.mechanism: Synthesis Engine composes new relations guided by V (ethical guard).
HIRS_layers.transformation: New systemic relations added to Integrative Network.

HIRS_layers.mechanism: Principle constraints projected across all active layers.
HIRS_layers.transformation: Generative structures aligned to universal moral principles.

HIRS_layers.mechanism: Optimization Engine and Ethical Coherence Module prune bias and redundancy.
HIRS_layers.transformation: Generative outputs refined to equilibrium-preserving forms.

HIRS_layers.mechanism: Eternal Checksum and equilibrium tests for each generative event.
Propagation to nodes and return to I for continued production.

primary_feedback.description: RPM emissions reseed the next generative pass at the input layer.

cross_layer_feedback.description: Real-time analytic validation for all generative constructs.
Ethical-logic refinement ensures generative relations preserve equilibrium.

vertical_feedback.description: Principle alignment constraints broadcast to all operative layers.

node_synchronization.production_distribution: RPM shards propagated with integrity tags per node

tests: RPM completeness, non-redundancy, and moral stability
verification.outcome: Only verified generative structures may be propagated and re-seeded.

expected_outputs.Reflective Production Matrix (RPM): Canonical map of newly generated moral-logical structures.
expected_outputs.Generative Stability Report: Quantitative metrics of reflective production coherence per pass.
expected_outputs.Production Trace Log: Chronological, checksummed record of generative events for auditability.
